scripts.postbuild: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .\www -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .\www -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path .\dist\* -Destination .\www -Recurse -Force"
scripts.make-slides: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$pdf='C:\\werkenmetionicenvue\\5. Ionic Native - 2526 (1).pdf'; $out=Join-Path $PWD 'src\\assets\\slides'; if(-not (Test-Path $out)){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $out | Out-Null }; if (Get-Command magick -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { & magick -density 150 $pdf -quality 85 "$out\\slide-%03d.png" } elseif (Get-Command pdftoppm -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { & pdftoppm -png $pdf "$out\\slide" } else { Write-Error 'Neither magick nor pdftoppm found in PATH. Install ImageMagick or Poppler.'; exit 1 }"
